subtitle: This bread makes a good alternative to naan bread.

method.text: Sift the flour, baking powder and salt into a large mixing bowl. Work in the ghee or butter until the mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs. Knead in sufficient hand hot warm water to make a soft but not sticky dough. Knead for 5 more min until really smooth.
Divide the mixture into portions. Shape into balls. Flatten out with a rolling pin to a circle about 10 cm (4in) wide. Place on baking trays.
Heat a little oil in a frying pan or on a griddle. Lightly oil the roti. Fry for about 3 min on each side until golden brown. Serve.

title: Roti
